quotes.quote: My mum taught me to have a soul.
A mother's love liberates.
Mum always taught us that compassion and kindness were the most important things in life, that it was better to be kind than right.
Most mothers are instinctive philosophers.
A mother is God’s deputy on earth.
Some are kissing mothers and some are scolding mothers, but it is love just the same, and most mothers kiss and scold together.
Motherhood is always an act of courage.
A mother who is really a mother is never free.
Mothers reflect God's loving presence on earth.
One good mother is worth hundreds of schoolmasters.
For when a child is born the mother also is born again.
A mother is a mother still, The holiest thing alive.
Good mothers are underrated, just like good defense.
All mothers have intuition. The great ones have radar.
There's no way to repay a mother's love, or lack of it.
Mother: the most beautiful word on the lips of mankind.
A mother is a child's first looking glass into the world.
A mother always thinks twice: for herself and for the child
Being mum is a number one job. That takes priority.
Mum was the matriarch and the patriarch of the family.
My mum taught me always to see the funny side of things.
Being a mum is the best thing that has ever been given to me in my life.
Being a mother is magical.
Mother's love grows by giving.
All mothers are working mothers.
A mother is the heart of the home.
A baby's mother also needs a mother.
Mothers are the necessity of invention.
A mother is the truest friend we have.
Only a mother knows a mother's fondness.
